title: verify user login functionality
description: Test the /api/auth/login endpoint to ensure users can log in with valid credentials and receive a token and user object. Verify that invalid credentials return a 401 status.

title: verify csrf token retrieval
description: Test the /api/auth/csrf endpoint to ensure it returns a valid CSRF token for secure API interactions.

title: verify operator creation by admin
description: Test the /api/admin/create-operator endpoint to ensure an admin can create an operator and company with valid data, and that invalid data or unauthorized access is handled properly.

title: verify employee creation by operator
description: Test the /api/operator/create-employee endpoint to ensure operators can create employees with valid data and that invalid data is rejected.

title: verify budgets listing and creation
description: Test the /api/costs/budgets endpoint for GET to list budgets and POST to create a new budget with valid data.

title: verify cost kpis retrieval
description: Test the /api/costs/kpis endpoint to ensure it returns accurate cost KPIs including total costs, budget, and variance.

title: verify report execution
description: Test the /api/reports/run endpoint to ensure reports can be generated in pdf, excel, and csv formats with appropriate filters.

title: verify report scheduling
description: Test the /api/reports/schedule endpoint to ensure reports can be scheduled with valid report type, schedule, and recipients.

title: verify kpis refresh cron job
description: Test the /api/cron/refresh-kpis endpoint to ensure KPIs are refreshed successfully when the cron job is triggered.

title: verify health check endpoint
description: Test the /api/health endpoint to ensure it returns the application health status including Supabase connectivity and timestamp.
